trends: There have been 52 other sightings in glendale
There were 2 other sightings in glendale on or around July 10th 1995
divs: Sighting DetailsI had just previously filled this form out on Saturday, June 16, 2012. unfortunately I have no pictures or video as proof. I recently had gone to the area where this event had occurred and I had taken pictures of the area where the circular probe had traveled. In the pictures, i have shows the area in which I had a clear line of site on the probe (20 foot diameter) One will have to use their imagination, I KNOW WHAT I SAW!!! It could have been a GATEWAY for TIME TRAVEL ! I don���t know, but the month of July is just around the corner. Will there be another? I don���t know. But it sure would be nice to investigate this phenomenon.
Summary: it came from a gateway (appearance of bright white cross / then cross vanishes)
